tool_description: An api for gospel hymns of all types, with over 260 hymns in our database. Please contact us if you did not find any hymn
name: EmaHymns Api
title: EmaHymns Api

api_list.name: Get Hymms By Name
api_list.description:
Get an hymn by just typing the name
https://emahymns-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/search/{:term}
Replace {:term} with the name of your hymn title

Example
https://emahymns-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/search/old rugged cross
